core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Academic Rigor with Gaming UI intensity
Emotion First: Anxiety reduction through calm, deep slate backgrounds
Content is King: Questions and Learning material take center stage
Zoom In: Focus mode for exams, removing all distractions

usage_rules: Never use Inter for Headings (H1-H3). Use Outfit.
Use JetBrains Mono for exam timers and code snippets.

rules: No full-screen gradients. Use gradients only for accents or buttons.
Dark mode is default. Background is Slate-950, not Black.
Use Primary colors sparingly for CTAs and active states.

ExamTimer.style: fixed top-4 right-4 z-50 font-mono text-xl bg-slate-900 border border-slate-700 px-4 py-2 rounded-lg shadow-xl
ExamTimer.behavior: Changes color to red when < 5 mins left

QuestionPalette.style: grid grid-cols-5 gap-2 p-4 bg-slate-900/50 rounded-lg

elements: Textarea with min-h-[150px] bg-slate-950 border-slate-800 focus:border-blue-500
Mic icon absolute bottom-4 right-4 text-blue-400 hover:text-blue-300 cursor-pointer animate-pulse

images.description: Student studying at night, focused atmosphere
images.placement: Landing Page Hero / Student Dashboard Welcome
Teacher Dashboard Header / Paper Generator Section
AI Doubt Solving Background / Login Page Side Panel

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text-slate-300 or lighter on slate-900 backgrounds.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Setup: Ensure Tailwind config extends colors with the 'Deep Slate' palette.
2. Components: Use Shadcn for functional components but style them with the 'customization_rules'.
3. Layout: Implement the 'Exam Interface' as a distinct layout without the main sidebar/header to minimize distractions.
4. Role-Based UI: Use Blue accents for Student views and Emerald accents for Teacher views to visually distinguish roles.
5. AI Features: When implementing the Doubt Solver or Paper Generator, use the 'ai_background' image with a heavy blur/overlay to create a 'tech' atmosphere.
6. Mobile: Ensure the Exam Interface stacks vertically on mobile (Question on top, Palette in a drawer/sheet).
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attribute.
